short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that will allow you to convert your Palestine related posts so that facebook won't delete it. #GhazaUnderAttack

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that is mainly made to support Palestine. It simply takes your posts and convert it to posts which could be submitted into facebook or social media by checking for specific words in your post.
